Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 7 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Bargain Hunter: +2 initial gold/May use Diplomacy to Earn Income
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Glad-Hand: May use Diplomacy with a -5 penalty to Make an Impression immediately upon meeting; may retry after 1 min
Group Impression: May use Diplomacy to Make an Impression with 10 targets
Hobnobber: May Gather Information in half normal time/Critical failures on Gather Information when taking normal time are normal failures
Legendary Negotiation: (3) May use Diplomacy with a -5 penalty to convince a foe to negotiate; requires a successful Make an Impression followed by a successful Request
Shameless Request: -2 DC for an outrageous request, and critical failures are normal failures
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Versatile Performance: May use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation
